title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: On the 15th of September 1826, at a late hour in the evening, a man and a woman might have been seen coming along the High Riggs on their way to the West Port The man was the companion of Evelyn Douglas, and the woman was his paramour. She carried an infant in her arms, carefully wrapped up from the chiU air of night.
